attributes.action: Professor Jason Leitch CBE FRCS should be Knighted
attributes.additional_details: Professor Jason Leitch who has worked tirelessly to protect the public with advice including mainstream programmes and adverts, always answering difficult questions and instilling calm should in the interest of fairness also be knighted like his counterparts elsewhere in the UK..
attributes.background: The latest New Years Honours list included government advisors receiving well deserved titles in being knighted to become 'Sirs'.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
